About Me


Hi, there ；）

I'm a student journalist at Northeastern University’s Media Innovation program.

I began to learn web design and visualization technology in 2017 and develped great interests in data journalism. In my opinion, data visualization enabled us to tell stories in a way that is both rational and aesthetically pleasing.
